item.title: Esempio: misura durezza
item.dc:creator: Paolo Bosetti
item.description:
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  fig.align = "center",
  # This for default device
  out.width = "16cm",
  # This two for high quality charts:
  fig.dim = c(16, 9)*0.4
)
